title: Strengthening Business Practical Competencies: Gamification Design Workshop for Science Learners

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners create a design plan to apply gamification core elements (competition, collaboration, engagement activities) to science education.
Learners develop two types of gamification scenarios (individual/team-based) executable in an LMS environment.

Learners provide feedback with specific improvement suggestions on three peer-designed gamification proposals using a five-item rubric (e.g., goal clarity, engagement, reward system) and receive peer ratings of 4/5 or higher in feedback clarity and practicality.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
